articles.author: Stephen Nellis
articles.title: Nvidia shows AI model that can modify voices, generate novel sounds - Reuters
articles.description: Nvidia on Monday showed a new artificial intelligence model for generating music and audio that can modify voices and generate novel sounds - technology aimed at the producers of music, films and video games.
